#### PR description:

The header consistency check of #39428 was [reporting](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-2aec6d/27687/headers_chks.log) these, so I added them in a separate PR.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Add missing includes to two AlpakaCore headers
